languages.text: "Необязательно было убивать всех ксеносов. Они могли рассказать о гемункуле".

traits.locale_text: "Необязательно было убивать всех ксеносов. Они могли рассказать о гемункуле".

languages.text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."
languages.original_text: "Необязательно было убивать всех ксеносов. Они могли рассказать о гемункуле".

traits.locale_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could've told us about the Haemonculus."
"Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could've told us about the Haemonculus."
"Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could've told us about the Haemonculus."
"Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could've told us about the Haemonculus."
"Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."
"Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

languages.text: «No había necesidad de exterminar a todos los xenos. Podrían habernos dicho algo sobre el Hemónculo».
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: «No había necesidad de exterminar a todos los xenos. Podrían habernos dicho algo sobre el Hemónculo».

languages.text: “根本没必要消灭所有异形，他们本可以告诉我们关于血伶人的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: “没必要消灭所有异形，他们本可以告诉我们关于血伶人的事情。”

languages.text: « Il n'était pas nécessaire de tuer tous les xénos. Ils auraient pu nous en apprendre davantage sur l'hémoncule. »
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'était pas nécessaire de tuer tous les xénos. Ils auraient pu nous parler de l'hémoncule. »

languages.text: 「異種族を一掃する必要はなかった。彼らはハモンキュラスについて何か教えてくれたかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: 「ゼノを一掃する必要はなかった。彼らはハモンキュラスについて教えてくれたかもしれない」

languages.text: "Es war unnötig, alle Xenos auszulöschen. Sie hätten uns von dem Haemonculus erzählen können."
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."

traits.locale_text: "Es war unnötig, alle Xenos auszulöschen. Sie hätten uns von dem Haemonculus erzählen können."

languages.text: "Tüm zenoları ortadan kaldırmaya gerek yoktu. Bize Haimonkulus hakkında bir şeyler söyleyebilirlerdi."
languages.original_text: "Wiping out all the xenos was unnecessary. They could have told us something about the Haemonculus."
